faqs.question: Do I need to check RERA status when buying a 2BHK flat in South City 1
faqs.answer: If you are purchasing a flat within a newly constructed group housing society or a multi-unit builder floor that falls under the RERA scope then yes checking the RERA registration status is essential for buyer protection and transparency. For older standalone properties or resale units the compliance focus shifts to verifying clear title deeds and occupancy certificates. We verify all relevant legal documents regardless of the property type.

faqs.question: What documentation is crucial before finalizing the purchase of a 2BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Crucial documentation includes a clear and marketable title deed the sanctioned building plan the occupancy certificate from the relevant authority and all previous sale agreements to establish the chain of ownership. If the property is a part of a society checking the society’s NOC no objection certificate and maintenance dues clearance is also important for a smooth transfer of ownership.
